issue.title: [C++] Use more vanilla Google C++ formatting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1219](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1219). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I find the Google coding style used in TensorFlow, Apache Kudu, and other projects to be a little more readable and having more stylistic consistency with Python code, too. I will put up a patch and we can discuss. Mostly function signatures are affected
